issue.title: [Doc][Guide] Lifecycle of a PR - minor corrections
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15348](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15348). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
#### **step_by_step/pr_and_github.rst**
 \* Change the filename from “pr_and_github.rst” to “pr_lifecycle.rst”
 \* Step 1: Change the first sentence frm “Update/sync the code from your upstream in the master branch.” to “Update your fork’s master branch with ``upstream/master``.” And “Run it …” with “Run this …”.
 \* Step 1: Omit “--ff-only” and only keep “pull”<font color="#de350b"> - </font><font color="#de350b">yes/no?</font>
 \* “Commenting on a pull request” section → change “... **you** pull request …” to “ … **your** pull request …” in the second paragraph.
